description: Jam-packed with scenes from cute to quirky, wacky to weird, artist Colin Thompson fills every inch of our “Bizarre Town” puzzle with fantastical fun! Dive in to the weird, wacky, and wonderful world of Colin Thompson with this highly detailed and colorful puzzle! While puzzling, take a closer look at these illustrations as there are some intriguing objects, scenes, and even houses hidden away amongst the scene. Each Ravensburger Puzzle is constructed with our exclusive materials and specially-designed tools to ensure the highest quality puzzling experience. Since 1891 we've been making the world's finest puzzles in Ravensburg, Germany. Our attention to detail has made Ravensburger the world's greatest puzzle brand!
